reviews.review_msg: I totally love this class. It is so interesting and so much fun because of Cindy. She's caring and so sweet and does everything in her power to make lecture fun. She brings dinosaurs and does fun labs for you to learn. Shes awesome!
Cindy was an great lecturer. I never skipped a class. However, her midterms and final were next to impossible, although the final was a bit easier. The lab helped my grade a lot.
